A

AbstractTransmission - Class in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
A abstract class providing default functionality for every kind of transmission including progress calculation, average speed calculation, a adapter interface to notify about progress changes and failure handling.
AbstractTransmission(AbstractTransmissionAdapter) - Constructor for class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.AbstractTransmission
Creates a new AbstarctTransmission instance.
AbstractTransmissionAdapter - Interface in de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore
An adapter interface allowing a class to be informed about status updates of a AbstractTransmission object.
addAllNetworkEnvironmentListeners(List<NetworkEnvironmentListener>) - Method in class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironment
Adds all NetworkEnvironmentListeners contained in the given List.
addNetworkEnvironmentListener(NetworkEnvironmentListener) - Method in class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironment
Adds the given NetworkEnvironmentListener to this NetworkEnvironment
apply(NetworkEnvironment) - Method in class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor
Applies the changes and restarts the NetworkEnvironment
applyAll(NetworkEnvironmentSettings, NetworkEnvironment) - Method in class de.hfu.anybeam.networkCore.NetworkEnvironmentSettingsEditor
